attributes.satisfied_if: BUILDING.HAS_FIRE_PROTECTION_EQUIPMENT_AND_INSTALLATIONS_AS_PER_TABLE_1_1 AND FIRE_PROTECTION_INSTALLATIONS.DESIGN.COMPLIES_WITH_RIPCI AND FIRE_PROTECTION_INSTALLATIONS.EXECUTION.COMPLIES_WITH_RIPCI AND FIRE_PROTECTION_INSTALLATIONS.COMMISSIONING.COMPLIES_WITH_RIPCI AND FIRE_PROTECTION_INSTALLATIONS.MAINTENANCE.COMPLIES_WITH_RIPCI AND FIRE_PROTECTION_INSTALLATIONS.MATERIALS.COMPLY_WITH_RIPCI AND FIRE_PROTECTION_INSTALLATIONS.COMPONENTS.COMPLY_WITH_RIPCI AND FIRE_PROTECTION_INSTALLATIONS.EQUIPMENT.COMPLY_WITH_RIPCI AND FIRE_PROTECTION_INSTALLATIONS.COMMISSIONING.COMPLIES_WITH_RIPCI_REGULATION

extractions.extraction_text: Los locales de riesgo especial, así como aquellas zonas cuyo uso previsto sea diferente y subsidiario del principal del edificio o del establecimiento en el que estén integradas y que, conforme a la tabla 1.1 del Capítulo 1 de la Sección 1 de este DB, deban constituir un sector de incidio diferente, deben disponer de la dotación de instalaciones que se indica para cada local de riesgo especial, así como para cada zona, en función de su uso previsto, pero en ningún caso será inferior a la exigida con carácter general para el uso principal del edificio o del establecimiento.

attributes.norm_statement: Special risk premises, as well as areas whose intended use is different and subsidiary to the main use of the building or establishment in which they are integrated and which, according to Table 1.1 of Chapter 1 of Section 1 of this DB, must constitute a different fire sector, must have the installation provision indicated for each special risk premise, as well as for each area, depending on its intended use, but in no case shall it be less than that generally required for the main use of the building or establishment.
attributes.applies_if: PREMISE.IS_SPECIAL_RISK OR (AREA.USAGE != BUILDING.MAIN_USAGE AND AREA.IS_SUBSIDIARY_TO_MAIN_USAGE AND AREA.MUST_BE_DIFFERENT_FIRE_SECTOR_AS_PER_TABLE_1_1_CH1_S1_DB)

extractions.extraction_text:
Table 1.1. Dotacion de instalaciones de proteccion contra incendios
Uso previsto del edificio o establecimientoCondiciones
Instalación
En general
Extintores portatilesUno de eficacia 21A -113B: - A 15 m de recorrido en cada planta, como máximo, desde todo origen de eva-cuación.

attributes.norm_statement: Portable fire extinguishers must be provided.

extractions.extraction_text: En las zonas de riesgo especial conforme al capítulo 2 de la Sección 1(1) de este DB.

attributes.norm_statement: Equipped fire hydrants must be installed in special risk zones as per Chapter 2, Section 1 of this DB.
attributes.notes: Context implies 'Bocas de incendio equipadas' applies here.

extractions.extraction_text: Bocas de incidio equipadas En zonas de riesgo especial alto, conforme al capítulo 2 de la Sección SI1, en las que el riesgo se deba principalmente a materias combustibles sólidas(2)

attributes.norm_statement: Equipped fire hydrants must be installed in high special risk zones, as per Chapter 2, Section SI1, where the risk is primarily due to solid combustible materials.

extractions.extraction_text: Ascensor de emergencia En las plantas cuya altura de evacuación exceda de 28 m

attributes.norm_statement: Emergency elevators must be installed on floors where the evacuation height exceeds 28 m.

extractions.extraction_text: Hidrantes exteriores Si la altura de evacuación descendente excede de 28 m o si la ascendente excede de 6 m, así como en establecimientos de densidad de ocupación mayor que 1 persona cada 5 m² y cuya superficie construida está comprendida entre 2.000 y 10.000 m².

attributes.norm_statement: Exterior hydrants must be installed if the descending evacuation height exceeds 28 m or the ascending evacuation height exceeds 6 m, as well as in establishments with an occupancy density greater than 1 person per 5 m² and a built area between 2,000 and 10,000 m².
attributes.applies_if: (EVACUATION.HEIGHT.DESCENDING > 28 OR EVACUATION.HEIGHT.ASCENDING > 6) OR (ESTABLISHMENT.OCCUPANCY.DENSITY > (1/5) AND ESTABLISHMENT.BUILT_AREA >= 2000 AND ESTABLISHMENT.BUILT_AREA <= 10000)

extractions.extraction_text: Al menos un hidrante hasta 10.000 m² de superficie construida y uno más por cada 10.000 m² adicionales o fracción.(3)

attributes.norm_statement: At least one hydrant for up to 10,000 m² of built area and one more for every additional 10,000 m² or fraction thereof.

extractions.extraction_text: Instalacion automatica de Salvo otra indicacion en relacion con el uso, en todo edificio cuya altura de evaextincion cuacadexceda de 80m

attributes.norm_statement: Automatic extinguishing system must be installed in any building whose evacuation height exceeds 80m, unless otherwise indicated for its use.

extractions.extraction_text: En cocinas en las que la potencia instalada exceda de 20 kW en uso Hospitalario o Residencial Publico o de 50 kW en cualquier otro uso(4)

attributes.norm_statement: Automatic extinguishing system must be installed in kitchens where the installed power exceeds 20 kW in Hospital or Public Residential use, or 50 kW in any other use.
attributes.applies_if: (KITCHEN.INSTALLED_POWER > 20 AND BUILDING.USAGE IN ['PUBLIC.HOSPITAL', 'PUBLIC.RESIDENTIAL']) OR (KITCHEN.INSTALLED_POWER > 50 AND BUILDING.USAGE NOT IN ['PUBLIC.HOSPITAL', 'PUBLIC.RESIDENTIAL'])

extractions.extraction_text: En centros de transformacion cuyos aparatos tengan aislamiento dielectrico con punto de inflamacion menor que 300°C y potencia instalada mayor que 1 000 kVA en cada aparato o mayor que 4 000 kVA en el conjunto de los aparatos. Si el cen. tro esta integrado en un edificio de uso Publica comuncrencia y tiene acceso desde el interior del edificio, dichas potencias son 630 kVA y 2 520 kVA respectivamente.

attributes.norm_statement: Automatic extinguishing system must be installed in transformation centers where devices have dielectric insulation with a flash point less than 300°C and installed power greater than 1,000 kVA per device or 4,000 kVA for all devices. If the center is integrated into a public assembly building and has interior access, these powers are 630 kVA and 2,520 kVA respectively.
attributes.applies_if: (TRANSFORMATION_CENTER.DIELECTRIC_INSULATION.FLASH_POINT < 300 AND (TRANSFORMATION_CENTER.DEVICE.INSTALLED_POWER > 1000 OR TRANSFORMATION_CENTER.TOTAL_INSTALLED_POWER > 4000)) OR (TRANSFORMATION_CENTER.DIELECTRIC_INSULATION.FLASH_POINT < 300 AND BUILDING.USAGE == 'PUBLIC.ASSEMBLY' AND BUILDING.ACCESS.INTERIOR == TRUE AND (TRANSFORMATION_CENTER.DEVICE.INSTALLED_POWER > 630 OR TRANSFORMATION_CENTER.TOTAL_INSTALLED_POWER > 2520))

attributes.section_summary: Regulations for residential housing.

extractions.extraction_text: Columna seca(5) Si la altura de evacuacion excede de 24m

attributes.norm_statement: Dry riser must be installed if the evacuation height exceeds 24m.

extractions.extraction_text: Sistema de deteccion y de Si la altura de evacuacion excede de 50m (6) alarma de incendio

attributes.norm_statement: Fire detection and alarm system must be installed if the evacuation height exceeds 50m.

extractions.extraction_text: Hidrantes exteriores Uno si la superficie total construida este comprenidia entre 5.000 y 10.000m² Uno mas por cada 10.000m² adicionales o fraccion.(3)

attributes.norm_statement: One exterior hydrant if the total built area is between 5,000 and 10,000 m², and one more for every additional 10,000 m² or fraction thereof.

attributes.section_summary: Regulations for administrative buildings.

extractions.extraction_text: Bocas de incendio equipadas Si la superficie construida excede de 2.000m² (7)

attributes.norm_statement: Equipped fire hydrants must be installed if the built area exceeds 2,000 m².

extractions.extraction_text: Columna seca(5) Si la altura de evacuacion excede de 24m

attributes.norm_statement: Dry riser must be installed if the evacuation height exceeds 24m.

extractions.extraction_text: Sistema de alarma(6) Si la superficie construida excede de 1.000m²

attributes.norm_statement: Alarm system must be installed if the built area exceeds 1,000 m².

extractions.extraction_text: Sistema de deteccion de incendio Si la superficie construida excede de 2.000m² , detectores en zonas de riesgo alto conforme al capitulo 2 de la Seccion 1 de este DB.Si excede de 5.000m² ,en todo el edificio.

attributes.norm_statement: Fire detection system must be installed. If the built area exceeds 2,000 m², detectors must be in high-risk zones as per Chapter 2, Section 1 of this DB. If it exceeds 5,000 m², detectors must be throughout the entire building.
attributes.satisfied_if: (BUILT_AREA > 2000 AND DETECTORS.LOCATION == 'HIGH_RISK_ZONES' AND LOCATION.REFERENCE == 'DB.SECTION.1.CHAPTER.2') OR (BUILT_AREA > 5000 AND DETECTORS.LOCATION == 'ENTIRE_BUILDING')

extractions.extraction_text: Hidrantes exteriores Uno si la superficie total construida esta comprenidia entre 5.000 y 10.000m² Uno mas por cada 10.000m² adicionales o fraccion.(3)

attributes.norm_statement: One exterior hydrant if the total built area is between 5,000 and 10,000 m², and one more for every additional 10,000 m² or fraction thereof.

attributes.section_summary: Regulations for public residential buildings.

extractions.extraction_text: Bocas de incendio equipadas Si la superficie construida excede de 1.000m² o el establecimiento esta previsto para dar alojamiento a mas de 50 personas.(7)

attributes.norm_statement: Equipped fire hydrants must be installed if the built area exceeds 1,000 m² or the establishment is intended to accommodate more than 50 people.

extractions.extraction_text: Columna seca(5) Si la altura de evacuacion excede de 24m

attributes.norm_statement: Dry riser must be installed if the evacuation height exceeds 24m.

extractions.extraction_text: Sistema de deteccion y de Si la superficie construida excede de 500m² (8) alarma de incendio

attributes.norm_statement: Fire detection and alarm system must be installed if the built area exceeds 500 m².

extractions.extraction_text: Instalacion automatica de extinction Si la altura de evacuacion excede de 28m o la superficie construida del establecimenio excede de 5000m²

attributes.norm_statement: Automatic extinguishing system must be installed if the evacuation height exceeds 28m or the built area of the establishment exceeds 5,000 m².

attributes.section_summary: Requirements for outdoor hydrants based on built area.

extractions.extraction_text: Uno si la superficie total construida esta comprenidia entre 2.000 y  10.000m^2  Uno mas por cada  10000m^2  adicionales o fraccion.(3)

attributes.norm_statement: One outdoor hydrant if the total built area is between 2,000 and 10,000 m². One more for every additional 10,000 m² or fraction thereof.

attributes.section_summary: Fire safety requirements for hospital buildings.
Requirements for portable fire extinguishers in hospitals.

extractions.extraction_text: En las zonas de riesgo especial alto, conforme al capitulo 2 de la Seccion 1 de este DB.cuya superficie construida excede de  500m^2  un extintor movil de  25kg  de polvo o de  CO_2  por cada  2.500m^2  de superficie o fraccion.

attributes.norm_statement: In high special risk areas, as per Chapter 2 of Section 1 of this DB, with a built area exceeding 500 m², one mobile extinguisher of 25 kg powder or CO2 for every 2,500 m² of surface or fraction thereof.
attributes.satisfied_if: FIRE_SAFETY.EXTINGUISHER.MOBILE.COUNT >= CEIL(AREA.SIZE / 2500) AND FIRE_SAFETY.EXTINGUISHER.MOBILE.TYPE IN ['POWDER', 'CO2'] AND FIRE_SAFETY.EXTINGUISHER.MOBILE.WEIGHT == 25
attributes.notes: Reference to 'Chapter 2 of Section 1 of this DB' is a cross-reference.

attributes.section_summary: Requirements for dry risers in hospitals.

extractions.extraction_text: Si la altura de evacuacion excede de  15m

attributes.norm_statement: Dry riser required if evacuation height exceeds 15m.

extractions.extraction_text: Bocas de incendio equipadas En todo caso.(7)

attributes.section_summary: Requirements for equipped fire hydrants in hospitals.

attributes.norm_statement: Equipped fire hydrants are required in all cases.

extractions.extraction_text: Sistema de deteccion y de alarma de incendio

attributes.section_title: Sistema de deteccion y de alarma de incendio
attributes.section_summary: Requirements for fire detection and alarm systems in hospitals.

extractions.extraction_text: En todo caso. El sistema dispondra de detectores y de pulsadores manuales y debe permitir la transmision de alamas locales, de alarma general y de instrucciones verbales.

attributes.norm_statement: A fire detection and alarm system is required in all cases. The system must have detectors and manual call points and allow the transmission of local alarms, general alarms, and verbal instructions.
attributes.satisfied_if: FIRE_SAFETY.DETECTION_ALARM_SYSTEM.INSTALLED == TRUE AND FIRE_SAFETY.DETECTION_ALARM_SYSTEM.HAS_DETECTORS == TRUE AND FIRE_SAFETY.DETECTION_ALARM_SYSTEM.HAS_MANUAL_CALL_POINTS == TRUE AND FIRE_SAFETY.DETECTION_ALARM_SYSTEM.ALLOWS_LOCAL_ALARMS == TRUE AND FIRE_SAFETY.DETECTION_ALARM_SYSTEM.ALLOWS_GENERAL_ALARMS == TRUE AND FIRE_SAFETY.DETECTION_ALARM_SYSTEM.ALLOWS_VERBAL_INSTRUCTIONS == TRUE

extractions.extraction_text: Si el edificio dispone de mas de 100 camas debe contar con comunicacion telefo nica directa con el servicio de bomberos.

attributes.norm_statement: If the building has more than 100 beds, it must have direct telephone communication with the fire department.

attributes.section_summary: Requirements for emergency elevators in hospitals.

extractions.extraction_text: En las zonas de hospitalizacion y de tratamiento intensivo cuya altura de evacuacion es mayor que  15m

attributes.norm_statement: Emergency elevator required in hospitalization and intensive treatment areas where evacuation height is greater than 15m.
attributes.applies_if: BUILDING.USAGE == 'PUBLIC.HOSPITAL' AND AREA.TYPE IN ['HOSPITALIZATION', 'INTENSIVE_TREATMENT'] AND AREA.EVACUATION.HEIGHT > 15

attributes.section_summary: Requirements for outdoor hydrants in hospitals.

extractions.extraction_text: Uno si la superficie total construida esta comprendida entre  2.000 x 10.000 m^2 . Uno mas por cada  10.000 m^2  adicionales o fraccion.

attributes.norm_statement: One outdoor hydrant if the total built area is between 2,000 and 10,000 m². One more for every additional 10,000 m² or fraction thereof.

attributes.section_summary: Fire safety requirements for educational buildings.

extractions.extraction_text: Bocas de incendio equipadas Si la superficie construida excede de  2.000 m^2 .

attributes.section_summary: Requirements for equipped fire hydrants in educational buildings.

extractions.extraction_text: Si la superficie construida excede de  2.000 m^2 .

attributes.norm_statement: Equipped fire hydrants required if built area exceeds 2,000 m².

attributes.section_summary: Requirements for dry risers in educational buildings.

extractions.extraction_text: Si la altura de evacuacion excede de  24m

attributes.norm_statement: Dry riser required if evacuation height exceeds 24m.

attributes.section_summary: Requirements for alarm systems in educational buildings.

extractions.extraction_text: Si la superficie construida excede de  1.000 m^2

attributes.norm_statement: Alarm system required if built area exceeds 1,000 m².

attributes.section_summary: Requirements for fire detection systems in educational buildings.

extractions.extraction_text: Si la superficie construida excede de  2.000 m^2 , detectores en zonas de riesgo alto conforme al capitulo 2 de la Seccion 1 de este DB. Si excede de  5.000 m^2 , en todo el edificio.

attributes.norm_statement: If the built area exceeds 2,000 m², detectors are required in high-risk areas as per Chapter 2 of Section 1 of this DB. If it exceeds 5,000 m², detectors are required throughout the entire building.
attributes.notes: Reference to 'Chapter 2 of Section 1 of this DB' is a cross-reference.

attributes.section_summary: Requirements for outdoor hydrants in educational buildings.

extractions.extraction_text: Uno si la superficie total construida esta comprendida entre  5.000 x 10.000 m^2 . Uno mas por cada  10.000 m^2  adicionales o fraccion.

attributes.norm_statement: One outdoor hydrant if the total built area is between 5,000 and 10,000 m². One more for every additional 10,000 m² or fraction thereof.

attributes.section_summary: Fire safety requirements for commercial buildings.
Requirements for portable fire extinguishers in commercial buildings.

extractions.extraction_text: En toda agrupacion de locales de riesgo especial/ medio y alto cuya superficie construida total excede de  1.000m^2  extintores movies de  50kg  de polvo, distri- . buidos a razon de un extintor por cada  1000m^2  de superficie que supere dicho limite o fraccion.

attributes.norm_statement: In any group of special/medium and high-risk premises whose total built area exceeds 1,000 m², 50 kg powder mobile extinguishers are required, distributed at a rate of one extinguisher for every 1,000 m² of surface exceeding said limit or fraction thereof.
attributes.applies_if: BUILDING.USAGE == 'PUBLIC.COMMERCIAL' AND AREA_GROUP.RISK_LEVEL IN ['SPECIAL', 'MEDIUM', 'HIGH'] AND AREA_GROUP.TOTAL_SIZE > 1000
attributes.satisfied_if: FIRE_SAFETY.EXTINGUISHER.MOBILE.COUNT >= CEIL((AREA_GROUP.TOTAL_SIZE - 1000) / 1000) AND FIRE_SAFETY.EXTINGUISHER.MOBILE.TYPE == 'POWDER' AND FIRE_SAFETY.EXTINGUISHER.MOBILE.WEIGHT == 50

extractions.extraction_text: Bocas de incendio equipadas Si la superficie construida excede de  500m^2 .

attributes.section_summary: Requirements for equipped fire hydrants in commercial buildings.

extractions.extraction_text: Si la superficie construida excede de  500m^2 .

attributes.norm_statement: Equipped fire hydrants required if built area exceeds 500 m².

attributes.section_summary: Requirements for dry risers in commercial buildings.

extractions.extraction_text: Si la altura de evacuacion excede de  24m

attributes.norm_statement: Dry riser required if evacuation height exceeds 24m.

attributes.section_summary: Requirements for alarm systems in commercial buildings.

extractions.extraction_text: Si la superficie construida excede de  1.000m^2

attributes.norm_statement: Alarm system required if built area exceeds 1,000 m².

attributes.section_summary: Requirements for fire detection systems in commercial buildings.

extractions.extraction_text: Si la superficie construida excede de  2.000m^2 .

attributes.norm_statement: Fire detection system required if built area exceeds 2,000 m².

attributes.section_summary: Requirements for automatic extinguishing systems in commercial buildings.

extractions.extraction_text: Si la superficie total construida del area publica de ventas excede de  1.500m^2  y en ella la densidad de carga de fuego ponderada y corregida aportada por los productos comercializados es mayor que  500 MJ / m^2 , contará con la instalacion, tanto el área publica de ventas, como los locales y zonas de riesgo especial medio y alto conforme al capitulo 2 de la Seccion 1 de este DB.

attributes.norm_statement: If the total built area of the public sales area exceeds 1,500 m² and the weighted and corrected fire load density provided by the marketed products is greater than 500 MJ/m², the installation must be present in both the public sales area and the special medium and high-risk premises and areas as per Chapter 2 of Section 1 of this DB.
attributes.applies_if: BUILDING.USAGE == 'PUBLIC.COMMERCIAL' AND AREA.TYPE == 'PUBLIC_SALES' AND AREA.SIZE > 1500 AND AREA.FIRE_LOAD_DENSITY_WEIGHTED_CORRECTED > 500
attributes.notes: Reference to 'Chapter 2 of Section 1 of this DB' is a cross-reference.

attributes.section_summary: Requirements for outdoor hydrants in commercial buildings.

extractions.extraction_text: Uno si la superficie total construida esta comprendida entre  $1000 \times 1000 \text{m}^2$ . Uno mas por cada  $10000 \text{m}^2$  adicionales o fraccion.

attributes.norm_statement: One fire hydrant if the total built area is between 1000 and 10000 m². One more for every 10000 m² additional or fraction.
attributes.satisfied_if: (BUILDING.AREA >= 1000 AND BUILDING.AREA <= 10000 AND FIRE_HYDRANTS.COUNT == 1) OR (BUILDING.AREA > 10000 AND FIRE_HYDRANTS.COUNT == (1 + CEIL((BUILDING.AREA - 10000) / 10000)))

attributes.section_summary: Requirements for public assembly buildings.

extractions.extraction_text: Bocas de incendio equipadas Si la superficie construida excede de  $500m^2$ .

attributes.norm_statement: Equipped fire hydrants are required if the built area exceeds 500 m².

extractions.extraction_text: Columna seca(5) Si la altura de evacuacion excede de  $24m$

attributes.norm_statement: Dry riser (5) if the evacuation height exceeds 24m.

extractions.extraction_text: Sistema de alarma(6) Si la ocupacion excede de 500 personas. El sistema debe ser apto para emitir mensajes por megafonia.

attributes.norm_statement: Alarm system (6) if occupancy exceeds 500 people. The system must be capable of broadcasting messages via public address.

extractions.extraction_text: Sistema de deteccion de incendio Si la superficie construida excede de  $1000m^2$ .

attributes.norm_statement: Fire detection system if the built area exceeds 1000 m².

extractions.extraction_text: Hidrantes exteriores En cines, teatros, auditorios y discotecas con superficie construida comprendida entre  $500 \times 10.000 \text{m}^2$  y en recintos deportivos con superficie construida compren- . dida entre  $5.000 \times 10.000 \text{m}^2$ .

attributes.norm_statement: Exterior hydrants in cinemas, theaters, auditoriums, and discos with built area between 500 and 10,000 m², and in sports venues with built area between 5,000 and 10,000 m².
attributes.applies_if: (BUILDING.USAGE IN ['CINEMA', 'THEATER', 'AUDITORIUM', 'DISCO'] AND BUILDING.AREA >= 500 AND BUILDING.AREA <= 10000) OR (BUILDING.USAGE == 'SPORTS_VENUE' AND BUILDING.AREA >= 5000 AND BUILDING.AREA <= 10000)

attributes.section_summary: Requirements for parking facilities.

extractions.extraction_text: Bocas de incendio equipadas Si la superficie construida excede de  $500m^2$ . Se excluyen los aparcamientos robotizados.

attributes.norm_statement: Equipped fire hydrants if the built area exceeds 500 m². Robotic parking lots are excluded.

extractions.extraction_text: Columna seca(5) Si existen mas de tres plantas bajo rasante o mas de cuatro sobre rasante, con tomas en todas sus plantas.

attributes.norm_statement: Dry riser (5) if there are more than three underground floors or more than four above ground, with outlets on all floors.

extractions.extraction_text: Sistema de deteccion de incendio En aparcamientos convencionales cuya superficie construida exceda de  $500m^2$ . Los aparcamientos robotizados dispondrán de pulsadores de alarma en todo caso.

attributes.norm_statement: Fire detection system in conventional parking lots with built area exceeding 500 m². Robotic parking lots must have alarm buttons in any case.
attributes.satisfied_if: (PARKING.TYPE == 'CONVENTIONAL' AND BUILDING.AREA > 500 AND FIRE_DETECTION_SYSTEM.INSTALLED == TRUE) OR (PARKING.TYPE == 'ROBOTIC' AND FIRE_ALARM_SYSTEM.BUTTONS.INSTALLED == TRUE)

extractions.extraction_text: Hidrantes exteriores Uno si la superficie construida está comprendida entre  $1.000 \times 10.000 \text{m}^2 \text{y uno más cada} 10.000 \text{m}^2 \text{más o fracción}$ .

attributes.norm_statement: Exterior hydrants: One if the built area is between 1,000 and 10,000 m², and one more for every additional 10,000 m² or fraction.
attributes.satisfied_if: (BUILDING.AREA >= 1000 AND BUILDING.AREA <= 10000 AND FIRE_HYDRANTS.EXTERIOR.COUNT == 1) OR (BUILDING.AREA > 10000 AND FIRE_HYDRANTS.EXTERIOR.COUNT == (1 + CEIL((BUILDING.AREA - 10000) / 10000)))

extractions.extraction_text: Instalacion automatica de extincion En todo aparcamiento robotizado.

attributes.norm_statement: Automatic extinguishing system in all robotic parking lots.

extractions.extraction_text: (1) Un extintor en el exterior del local o de la zona y proximo a la puerta de acceso, el cual podrá servir simultaneamente a varios locales o zonas. En el interior del local o de la zona se instalaran ademas los extintores necesarios para que el recorrido real hasta alguno de ellos, include el situado en el exterior, no sea mayor que  $15 \text{m}$  en locales y zonas de riesgo especial medio o bajo, o que  $10 \text{m}$  en locales o zonas de riesgo especial alto.

attributes.norm_statement: One extinguisher outside the premises or area and near the access door, which may serve several premises or areas simultaneously. Inside the premises or area, additional extinguishers must be installed so that the actual travel distance to any of them, including the one located outside, is not greater than 15 m in medium or low special risk premises and areas, or 10 m in high special risk premises or areas.
attributes.satisfied_if: (EXTINGUISHER.OUTSIDE.COUNT >= 1 AND EXTINGUISHER.OUTSIDE.LOCATION == 'NEAR_ACCESS_DOOR') AND ((AREA.RISK_LEVEL == 'MEDIUM' OR AREA.RISK_LEVEL == 'LOW') AND EXTINGUISHER.TRAVEL_DISTANCE <= 15); OR (AREA.RISK_LEVEL == 'HIGH' AND EXTINGUISHER.TRAVEL_DISTANCE <= 10)

extractions.extraction_text: (2) Los equipos serán de tipo  $45 \text{mm}$ , excepto en edificios de uso Residencial Vivienda, en lo que serán de tipo  $25 \text{mm}$ .

attributes.norm_statement: Equipment shall be of 45 mm type, except in residential housing buildings, where they shall be of 25 mm type.

extractions.extraction_text: (3) Para el computo de la dotación que se establece se pueden considerar los hidrantes que se encuentran en la via pública a menos de  $100 \text{m}$  de la fachacia accessible del edificio. Los hidrantes que se instalen pueden estar conectados a la red pública de suministro de agua.

attributes.norm_statement: For the calculation of the required provision, hydrants located in the public road less than 100 m from the accessible facade of the building may be considered. Installed hydrants may be connected to the public water supply network.

extractions.extraction_text: (4) Para la determinación de la potencia instalada sólo se considerarán los aparatos directamente destinados a la preparación de alimentos y susceptibles de provocar ignición. Las freídoras y las sartenes basculantes se computaran a razón de  $1 \text{kW}$  por cada litro de capacidad, independientemente de la potencia que tengan. La protección aportada por la instalación automática cubrirá los aparatos antes citados y la eficacia del sistema debe quedar asegurada teniendo en cuenta la actuación del sistema de extracción de humos.

attributes.norm_statement: For the determination of the installed power, only appliances directly intended for food preparation and capable of causing ignition will be considered. Fryers and tilting pans will be computed at a rate of 1 kW per liter of capacity, regardless of their power. The protection provided by the automatic installation will cover the aforementioned appliances, and the system's effectiveness must be ensured taking into account the operation of the smoke extraction system.
attributes.satisfied_if: INSTALLED_POWER.CALCULATION.INCLUDES_FOOD_PREP_APPLIANCES_CAPABLE_OF_IGNITION == TRUE AND (APPLIANCE.TYPE == 'FRYER' OR APPLIANCE.TYPE == 'TILTING_PAN') AND APPLIANCE.POWER_RATING == (APPLIANCE.CAPACITY * 1) AND FIRE_EXTINGUISHING_SYSTEM.AUTOMATIC.COVERS_APPLIANCES == TRUE AND SMOKE_EXTRACTION_SYSTEM.OPERATION.ENSURES_EFFECTIVENESS == TRUE

extractions.extraction_text: (5) Los municipios pueden sustaining esta condición por la de una instalación de bocas de incidio equipadas cuando, por el emplazamiento de un edificio por el nivel de dotación de los servicios públicos de extinción existentes, no quede garantizada la utilidad de la instalación de columna seca.

attributes.norm_statement: Municipalities may substitute the dry column installation with an equipped fire hydrant installation when the dry column's utility is not guaranteed due to building location or existing public fire services.

extractions.extraction_text: (6) El sistema de alarma transmitirá señales visuales ademas de acusticas. Las señales visuales serán perceptibles incluso en el interior de viviendas accesibles para personas con discapacidad auditiva (ver definición en el Anejo SUA A del DB SUA).

attributes.norm_statement: The alarm system must transmit visual signals in addition to acoustic ones. Visual signals must be perceptible even inside accessible dwellings for people with hearing disabilities.
attributes.satisfied_if: ALARM.SYSTEM.SIGNAL.VISUAL == TRUE AND ALARM.SYSTEM.SIGNAL.ACOUSTIC == TRUE AND ALARM.SYSTEM.SIGNAL.VISUAL.PERCEPTIBLE.DWELLING.ACCESSIBLE.HEARING_IMPAIRED == TRUE
attributes.notes: Refers to Annex SUA A of DB SUA for definition of accessible dwellings for hearing-impaired.

attributes.norm_statement: Equipment must be of 25mm type.

extractions.extraction_text: (8) El sistema dispondrá al menos de detectores de incidio.

attributes.norm_statement: The system must have at least fire detectors.

extractions.extraction_text: (9) La condición de disponer detectores automaticos térmicos puede sustituirse por una instalación automática de extinción no exigida.

attributes.norm_statement: The requirement for automatic thermal detectors can be substituted by a non-mandatory automatic extinguishing system.

extractions.extraction_text: # 2 Senalizacion de las instalaciones manuales de proteccion contra incendios

attributes.section_title: Senalizacion de las instalaciones manuales de proteccion contra incendios
attributes.section_summary: Signaling of manual fire protection installations

extractions.extraction_text: 1 La senalizacion de las instalaciones manuales de proteccion contra incendios debe cumplir lo establecido en el vigente Reglamento de instalaciones de proteccion contra incendios, aprobado por el Real Decreto 513/2017, de 22 de mayo.

attributes.norm_statement: The signaling of manual fire protection installations must comply with the current Regulation on Fire Protection Installations, approved by Royal Decree 513/2017, of May 22.

extractions.extraction_text: Reglamento de instalaciones de proteccion contra incendios, aprobado por el Real Decreto 513/2017, de 22 de mayo.

attributes.title: Reglamento de instalaciones de proteccion contra incendios
attributes.summary: Regulation on Fire Protection Installations

extractions.extraction_text: # Sección SI 5 Intervención de los bomberos

attributes.section_summary: Intervention of firefighters
Conditions for approach and surroundings for firefighters
Approach to buildings for firefighters

extractions.extraction_text: 1 Los viales de aproximación de los vehículos de los bomberos a los espacios de maniobra a los que se refiere el apartado 1.2, deben cumplir las condiciones siguientes: a) anchura mínima libre 3,5 m; b) altura mínima libre o gálibo 4,5 m; c)capacidad portante del vial 20 kN/m².

attributes.norm_statement: Approach roads for fire vehicles to maneuvering spaces must meet the following conditions: a) minimum clear width 3.5 m; b) minimum clear height or gauge 4.5 m; c) road bearing capacity 20 kN/m².

extractions.extraction_text: 2 En los tramos curvos, el carril de rodadura debe quedar delimitado por la traza de una corona circular cuyos radios mínimos deben ser 5,30 m y 12,50 m, con una anchura libre para circulación de 7,20 m.

attributes.norm_statement: In curved sections, the wheel track must be delimited by the trace of a circular crown with minimum radii of 5.30 m and 12.50 m, and a clear width for circulation of 7.20 m.
attributes.satisfied_if: WHEEL_TRACK.DELIMITED_BY.CIRCULAR_CROWN == TRUE AND CIRCULAR_CROWN.RADIUS.MINIMUM >= 5.30 AND CIRCULAR_CROWN.RADIUS.MINIMUM_SECOND >= 12.50 AND CIRCULAR_CROWN.WIDTH.CLEAR_CIRCULATION >= 7.20

attributes.section_summary: Building surroundings for firefighters

extractions.extraction_text: 1 Los edificios con una altura de evacuación descendente mayor que 9 m deben disponer de un espacio de maniobra para los bomberos que cumpla las siguientes condiciones a lo largo de las fachadas en las que estén situados los accesos, o bien al interior del edificio, o bien al espacio abierto interior en el que se encuentren aquellos: a) anchura mínima libre 5 m b) altura libre la del edificio c) separación máximo del vehículo de bomberos a la fachada del edificio  - edificios de hasta 15 m de altura de evacuación 23 m  - edificios de más de 15 m y hasta 20 m de altura de evacuación 18 m  - edificios de más de 20 m de altura de evacuación 10 m d) distancia máximo hasta los accesos al edificio necesarios para poder llegar hasta todas sus zonas 30 m e) pendiente máximo 10% f) resistencia al punzonamiento del suelo 100 kN sobre 20 cm φ

attributes.norm_statement: Buildings with a downward evacuation height greater than 9m must have a maneuvering space for firefighters along the facades where accesses are located, either to the interior of the building or to the interior open space where they are found, meeting the following conditions: a) minimum clear width 5m; b) clear height equal to the building's height; c) maximum separation of fire vehicle from building facade: up to 15m evacuation height - 23m, over 15m up to 20m evacuation height - 18m, over 20m evacuation height - 10m; d) maximum distance to building accesses to reach all areas 30m; e) maximum slope 10%; f) soil punching resistance 100 kN over 20 cm φ.
attributes.satisfied_if:
MANEUVERING.SPACE.FIRE_VEHICLE.WIDTH >= 5 AND MANEUVERING.SPACE.FIRE_VEHICLE.HEIGHT == BUILDING.HEIGHT AND (
                        (BUILDING.EVACUATION.HEIGHT <= 15 AND MANEUVERING.SPACE.FIRE_VEHICLE.SEPARATION.MAX <= 23) OR
                        (BUILDING.EVACUATION.HEIGHT > 15 AND BUILDING.EVACUATION.HEIGHT <= 20 AND MANEUVERING.SPACE.FIRE_VEHICLE.SEPARATION.MAX <= 18) OR
                        (BUILDING.EVACUATION.HEIGHT > 20 AND MANEUVERING.SPACE.FIRE_VEHICLE.SEPARATION.MAX <= 10)
                    ) AND MANEUVERING.SPACE.FIRE_VEHICLE.ACCESS.DISTANCE.MAX <= 30 AND MANEUVERING.SPACE.FIRE_VEHICLE.SLOPE.MAX <= 0.10 AND MANEUVERING.SPACE.FIRE_VEHICLE.SOIL.PUNCHING_RESISTANCE >= 100

extractions.extraction_text: 2 La condición referida al punzonamiento debe cumplirse en las tapas de registro de las canalizaciones de servicios públicos situadas en ese espacio, cuando sus dimensiones fueran mayores que 0,15m x 0,15m,abiendo cenirse a las especificaciones de la norma UNE- EN 124:2015.

attributes.norm_statement: The punching resistance condition must be met in the manhole covers of public service pipelines located in that space, when their dimensions are greater than 0.15m x 0.15m, complying with the specifications of standard UNE-EN 124:2015.

attributes.title: UNE-EN 124:2015
attributes.summary: Standard for manhole covers and gully tops for vehicular and pedestrian areas

extractions.extraction_text: El espacio de maniobra debe mantenense libre de mobiliario urbano, arbolado, jardines, mojones u otros obstáculos.

attributes.norm_statement: Maneuvering space must be kept free of urban furniture, trees, gardens, landmarks, or other obstacles.

extractions.extraction_text: donde se prevea el acceso a una fachada con escaleras o plataformas hidraulicas, se evitaran elementos tales como cables eléctricos aéreos o ramas de árboles que puedan interferir con las escaleras, etc.

attributes.norm_statement: Where access to a facade with ladders or hydraulic platforms is foreseen, elements such as overhead electrical cables or tree branches that could interfere with the ladders, etc., must be avoided.

extractions.extraction_text: En el caso de que el edificio esté equipado con columna seca debe haber acceso para un equipo de bombeo a menos de 18m de cada punto de conexión a ella. El punto de conexión sería visible desde el camión de bombeo.

attributes.norm_statement: If the building is equipped with a dry riser, there must be access for a pumping team within 18m of each connection point to it. The connection point must be visible from the pumping truck.

extractions.extraction_text: En las vías de acceso sin salida de más de 20m de largo se dispondirá de un espacio suficiente para la maniobra de los vehículos del servicio de extinción de incendios.

attributes.norm_statement: On dead-end access roads longer than 20m, sufficient space must be provided for the maneuvering of fire extinguishing service vehicles.

extractions.extraction_text: Debe haber una franja de 25m de anchura separando la zona edificada de la forestal, libre de arbustos o vegetación que pueda propagar un incendio del área forestal así como un camino perimetral de 5m , que podrá estar incluido en la citada franja;

attributes.norm_statement: There must be a 25m wide strip separating the built-up area from the forest area, free of shrubs or vegetation that could spread a fire from the forest area, as well as a 5m perimeter path, which may be included in the aforementioned strip.
attributes.satisfied_if: STRIP.WIDTH >= 25 AND STRIP.VEGETATION.FIRE_PROPAGATION == FALSE AND PERIMETER_PATH.WIDTH >= 5 AND (PERIMETER_PATH.INCLUDED_IN_STRIP == TRUE OR PERIMETER_PATH.INCLUDED_IN_STRIP == FALSE)

extractions.extraction_text: La zona edificada o urbanizada debe disponer preferentemente de dos vías de acceso alternativas, cada una de las cuales debe cumplir las condiciones expuestos en el apartado 1.1;

attributes.norm_statement: The built-up or urbanized area should preferably have two alternative access roads, each of which must comply with the conditions set out in section 1.1.
attributes.satisfied_if: ACCESS_ROADS.COUNT >= 2 AND ACCESS_ROADS.TYPE == 'ALTERNATIVE' AND ACCESS_ROADS.COMPLY_WITH_SECTION_1_1 == TRUE

extractions.extraction_text: Cuando no se pueda disponer de las dos vías alternativas indicadas en el párrafo anterior, el acceso único debe finalizar en un fondo de saco de forma circular de 12,50m de radio, en el que se cumplan las condiciones expresadas en el primer párrafo de este apartado.

attributes.norm_statement: When the two alternative routes indicated in the previous paragraph cannot be provided, the single access must end in a circular cul-de-sac with a radius of 12.50m, in which the conditions expressed in the first paragraph of this section are met.

attributes.section_summary: Rules for facade accessibility for fire services.

extractions.extraction_text: Las fachadas a las que se hace referencia en el apartado 1.2 deben disponer de huecos que permitan el acceso desde el exterior al personal del servicio de extinción de incendios. Dichos huecos deben cumplir las condiciones siguientes: a) Facilitar el acceso a cada una de las plantas del edificio, de forma que la altura del alfeizar respecto del nivel de la planta a la que accede no sea mayor que 1,20m b) Sus dimensiones horizontal y vertical deben ser, al menos, 0,80m y 1,20m respectivamente. La distancia maxima entre los ejes verticales de dos huecos consecutivos no debe exceder de 25 m, medida sobre la fachada; c) No se deben instalar en fachada elementos que impidan o dificulten la accesibilidad al interior del edificio a través de dichos huecos, a excepción de los elementos de seguridad situados en los huecos de las plantas cuya altura de evacuación no exceda de 9m

attributes.norm_statement: Facades referenced in section 1.2 must have openings that allow access from the exterior for fire extinguishing service personnel. These openings must meet the following conditions: a) Facilitate access to each floor of the building, so that the sill height relative to the floor level it accesses is not greater than 1.20m; b) Their horizontal and vertical dimensions must be at least 0.80m and 1.20m respectively. The maximum distance between the vertical axes of two consecutive openings must not exceed 25m, measured on the facade; c) Elements that prevent or hinder accessibility to the interior of the building through these openings must not be installed on the facade, with the exception of safety elements located in the openings of floors whose evacuation height does not exceed 9m.
attributes.satisfied_if: OPENINGS.ACCESS_TO_FIRE_SERVICE_PERSONNEL == TRUE AND OPENINGS.SILL_HEIGHT <= 1.20 AND OPENINGS.HORIZONTAL_DIMENSION >= 0.80 AND OPENINGS.VERTICAL_DIMENSION >= 1.20 AND OPENINGS.DISTANCE_BETWEEN_VERTICAL_AXES <= 25 AND FACADE.OBSTRUCTING_ELEMENTS == FALSE OR (FACADE.OBSTRUCTING_ELEMENTS == TRUE AND OBSTRUCTING_ELEMENTS.TYPE == 'SAFETY_ELEMENTS' AND FLOOR.EVACUATION_HEIGHT <= 9)

extractions.extraction_text: Los aparcamientos robotizados dispondrán, en cada sector de incendios en que estén compartimientos, de una via compartimentada con elementos El 120 y puertas El2 60- C5 que permita el acceso de los bomberos hasta cada nivel existente, así como de un sistema mecánico de extracción de humo capaz realizar 3 renovaciones/hora.

attributes.norm_statement: Robotic car parks must have, in each fire sector in which they are compartmentalized, a compartmentalized route with El 120 elements and El2 60-C5 doors that allows access for firefighters to each existing level, as well as a mechanical smoke extraction system capable of performing 3 air changes/hour.
attributes.satisfied_if: FIRE_SECTOR.COMPARTMENTALIZED_ROUTE.FIRE_RESISTANCE == 'EI_120' AND FIRE_SECTOR.COMPARTMENTALIZED_ROUTE.DOORS.FIRE_RESISTANCE == 'EI2_60_C5' AND FIRE_SECTOR.COMPARTMENTALIZED_ROUTE.ACCESS_FOR_FIREFIGHTERS == TRUE AND SMOKE_EXTRACTION_SYSTEM.TYPE == 'MECHANICAL' AND SMOKE_EXTRACTION_SYSTEM.AIR_CHANGES_PER_HOUR >= 3

extractions.extraction_text: # Sección SI 6 Resistencia al fuego de la estructura

attributes.section_title: Sección SI 6 Resistencia al fuego de la estructura
attributes.section_summary: This section details the fire resistance requirements for building structures.
General considerations regarding the effect of fire on building structures and calculation methods.

extractions.extraction_text: # 2 Resistencia al fuego de la estructura

attributes.section_title: Resistencia al fuego de la estructura
attributes.section_summary: Defines the criteria for sufficient fire resistance of structural elements.

extractions.extraction_text: 2 En este Documento Básico se indican únicamente métodos simplificados de calculo suficientemente aproximados para la mayoría de las situaciones habituales (véase anejos B a F). Estos métodos sólo recogen el estudio de la resistencia al fuego de los elementos estructurales individuales ante la curva normalizada tiempo temperatura.

attributes.Procedure: Simplified calculation methods are provided in this Basic Document (see annexes B to F) for assessing the fire resistance of individual structural elements against the standardized time-temperature curve.

extractions.extraction_text: 3 Pueden adoptarse otros modelos de incendio para representar la evolución de la temperatura durante el incendio, tales como las denominadas curvas paramétricas o, para efectos locales los modelos de incendio de una o doszonas o de juegos localizados o metodos basados en dinámica de huidos (CFD, según siglas inglesas) tales como los que se contemplan en la norma UNE- EN 1991- 1- 2:2004.

attributes.Procedure: Other fire models can be adopted to represent temperature evolution during fire, such as parametric curves, one- or two-zone fire models for local effects, localized fire models, or methods based on computational fluid dynamics (CFD) as described in UNE-EN 1991-1-2:2004.

extractions.extraction_text: 6 En cualquier caso, tambien es valido evaluar el comportamiento de una estructura, de parte de ella o de un elemento estructural mediante la realizacion de los ensayos que establece el Real Decreto842/2013 de 31 de octubre.

attributes.Procedure: The behavior of a structure, part of it, or a structural element can also be evaluated by conducting tests established in Royal Decree 842/2013 of October 31.

extractions.extraction_text: 1 Se admitte que un elemento tiene suficiente resistencia al fuego si, durante la duracion del incendio, el valor de calculo del electo de las acciones, en todo instante t, no supera el valor de la resistencia de dicho elemento. En general, basta con hacer la comprobacion en el instante de mayor temperatura que, con el modelo de curva normalizada tiempo- temperatura, se produce al final del mismo.

attributes.norm_statement: A structural element is considered to have sufficient fire resistance if, during the fire duration, the design value of the effect of actions at any time 't' does not exceed the resistance value of that element.
attributes.notes: Check is generally sufficient at the instant of highest temperature, which occurs at the end of the standardized time-temperature curve model.

attributes.title: Eurocode 1: Actions on structures - Part 1-2: General actions - Actions on structures exposed to fire
attributes.summary: Standard for fire actions on structures, including nominal curves for external fire or high calorific value fuels, and methods for external elements.
attributes.relevance: Provides alternative fire models and methods for structural fire analysis.

attributes.title: Eurocode 2: Design of concrete structures - Part 1-2: General rules - Structural fire design
attributes.summary: Includes resistance models for concrete materials under fire.
attributes.relevance: Provides material resistance models for concrete.

attributes.title: Eurocode 3: Design of steel structures - Part 1-2: General rules - Structural fire design
attributes.summary: Includes resistance models for steel materials under fire.
attributes.relevance: Provides material resistance models for steel.

attributes.title: Eurocode 4: Design of composite steel and concrete structures - Part 1-2: General rules - Structural fire design
attributes.summary: Includes resistance models for composite steel and concrete materials under fire.
attributes.relevance: Provides material resistance models for composite steel and concrete.

attributes.title: Eurocode 5: Design of timber structures - Part 1-2: General rules - Structural fire design
attributes.summary: Includes resistance models for timber materials under fire.
attributes.relevance: Provides material resistance models for timber.

attributes.title: Real Decreto 842/2013, de 31 de octubre, por el que se aprueba el Reglamento de seguridad contra incendios en los establecimientos industriales.
attributes.summary: Establishes tests for evaluating the behavior of structures, parts of structures, or structural elements.
attributes.relevance: Provides a legal framework for fire testing of structural elements.

extractions.extraction_text:
2 En el caso de sectores de riesgo minimo y en aquellos sectores de incendio en los que, por su tamaño y por la distribucion de la carga de fuego, no sea previsible la existencia de fuegos totalmente desarrollados, la comprobacion de la resistencia al fuego puede hacerse elemento a elemento me

diante el estudio por medio de fuegos localizados, según se indica en el Eurocódigo 1 (UNE- EN 1991- 1- 2: 2004) situando sucesivamente la carga de fuego en la posición previsible más desfavorable.

3 En este Documento Básico no se considera la capacidad portante de la estructura tras el incendio.

attributes.section_summary: Describes fire resistance verification for minimum risk fire sectors and those where fully developed fires are not expected, using localized fire studies according to Eurocode 1. Also states that the load-bearing capacity of the structure after fire is not considered in this Basic Document.
Defines sufficient fire resistance for main structural elements of a building.

extractions.extraction_text: Table 3.1 Resistencia al fuego suficiente de los elementos estructurales

attributes.section_title: Resistencia al fuego suficiente de los elementos estructurales
attributes.section_summary: Table detailing sufficient fire resistance for structural elements based on fire sector use and building evacuation height.

extractions.extraction_text: Table 3.2 Resistencia al fuego suficiente de los elementos estructurales de zonas de riesgo es-.

attributes.section_title: Resistencia al fuego suficiente de los elementos estructurales de zonas de riesgo es-.
attributes.section_summary: Table detailing sufficient fire resistance for structural elements in special risk zones.

extractions.extraction_text:
1 Se considera que la resistencia al fuego de un elemento estructural principal del edificio (includios forjados, vigas y soportes), es suficiente si:
a) alcaiza la clase indicada en la tabla 3.1 o 3.2 que representa el tiempo en minutos de resistencia ante la acción representada por la curva normalizada tiempo temperatura, o 
b) soporta dicha acción durante el tiempo equivalente de exposición al fuego indicado en el anejo B.

attributes.norm_statement: The fire resistance of a main structural element of the building (including slabs, beams, and supports) is considered sufficient if it reaches the class indicated in Table 3.1 or 3.2, representing the resistance time in minutes against the action represented by the standardized time-temperature curve, OR if it withstands said action during the equivalent fire exposure time indicated in Annex B.
For single-family homes, the fire resistance of structural elements must be R 30.

extractions.extraction_text: Residencial Vivienda, Residencial Público, Docente, Administrativo R 120 (Sótano)

attributes.norm_statement: For Residential Housing, Public Residential, Educational, and Administrative uses, structural elements in basements must have R 120 fire resistance.

extractions.extraction_text: Residencial Vivienda, Residencial Público, Docente, Administrativo R 60 (Plantas sobre rasante, altura de evacuación ≤15 m)

attributes.norm_statement: For Residential Housing, Public Residential, Educational, and Administrative uses, structural elements on above-ground floors with an evacuation height ≤15 m must have R 60 fire resistance.
attributes.applies_if: FIRE_SECTOR.USAGE IN ['RESIDENTIAL.HOUSING', 'PUBLIC.RESIDENTIAL', 'PUBLIC.EDUCATION', 'ADMINISTRATIVE'] AND LOCATION.TYPE == 'ABOVE_GROUND' AND BUILDING.EVACUATION_HEIGHT <= 15

extractions.extraction_text: Residencial Vivienda, Residencial Público, Docente, Administrativo R 90 (Plantas sobre rasante, altura de evacuación ≤28 m)

attributes.norm_statement: For Residential Housing, Public Residential, Educational, and Administrative uses, structural elements on above-ground floors with an evacuation height ≤28 m must have R 90 fire resistance.
attributes.applies_if: FIRE_SECTOR.USAGE IN ['RESIDENTIAL.HOUSING', 'PUBLIC.RESIDENTIAL', 'PUBLIC.EDUCATION', 'ADMINISTRATIVE'] AND LOCATION.TYPE == 'ABOVE_GROUND' AND BUILDING.EVACUATION_HEIGHT <= 28

extractions.extraction_text: Residencial Vivienda, Residencial Público, Docente, Administrativo R 120 (Plantas sobre rasante, altura de evacuación >28 m)

attributes.norm_statement: For Residential Housing, Public Residential, Educational, and Administrative uses, structural elements on above-ground floors with an evacuation height >28 m must have R 120 fire resistance.
attributes.applies_if: FIRE_SECTOR.USAGE IN ['RESIDENTIAL.HOUSING', 'PUBLIC.RESIDENTIAL', 'PUBLIC.EDUCATION', 'ADMINISTRATIVE'] AND LOCATION.TYPE == 'ABOVE_GROUND' AND BUILDING.EVACUATION_HEIGHT > 28

attributes.norm_statement: For Commercial, Public Assembly, and Hospital uses, structural elements in basements must have R 120 fire resistance.
attributes.notes: R 180 if evacuation height exceeds 28m.

extractions.extraction_text: Comercial, Pública concurrencia, Hospitalario R 90 (Plantas sobre rasante, altura de evacuación ≤15 m)

attributes.norm_statement: For Commercial, Public Assembly, and Hospital uses, structural elements on above-ground floors with an evacuation height ≤15 m must have R 90 fire resistance.
attributes.applies_if: FIRE_SECTOR.USAGE IN ['COMMERCIAL', 'PUBLIC.ASSEMBLY', 'PUBLIC.HOSPITAL'] AND LOCATION.TYPE == 'ABOVE_GROUND' AND BUILDING.EVACUATION_HEIGHT <= 15

extractions.extraction_text: Comercial, Pública concurrencia, Hospitalario R 120 (Plantas sobre rasante, altura de evacuación ≤28 m)

attributes.norm_statement: For Commercial, Public Assembly, and Hospital uses, structural elements on above-ground floors with an evacuation height ≤28 m must have R 120 fire resistance.
attributes.applies_if: FIRE_SECTOR.USAGE IN ['COMMERCIAL', 'PUBLIC.ASSEMBLY', 'PUBLIC.HOSPITAL'] AND LOCATION.TYPE == 'ABOVE_GROUND' AND BUILDING.EVACUATION_HEIGHT <= 28

extractions.extraction_text: Comercial, Pública concurrencia, Hospitalario R 180 (Plantas sobre rasante, altura de evacuación >28 m)

attributes.norm_statement: For Commercial, Public Assembly, and Hospital uses, structural elements on above-ground floors with an evacuation height >28 m must have R 180 fire resistance.
attributes.applies_if: FIRE_SECTOR.USAGE IN ['COMMERCIAL', 'PUBLIC.ASSEMBLY', 'PUBLIC.HOSPITAL'] AND LOCATION.TYPE == 'ABOVE_GROUND' AND BUILDING.EVACUATION_HEIGHT > 28

extractions.extraction_text: Aparcamiento (edificio de uso exclusivo o situado sobre otro uso) R 90 (Plantas sobre rasante)

attributes.norm_statement: For Parking use (exclusive building or located above another use), structural elements on above-ground floors must have R 90 fire resistance.
attributes.applies_if: FIRE_SECTOR.USAGE == 'PARKING' AND (BUILDING.TYPE == 'EXCLUSIVE_USE' OR LOCATION.RELATIONSHIP == 'ABOVE_OTHER_USE') AND LOCATION.TYPE == 'ABOVE_GROUND'

extractions.extraction_text: Aparcamiento (situado bajo un uso distinto) R 120 (Sótano)

attributes.norm_statement: For Parking use (located under a different use), structural elements in basements must have R 120 fire resistance.
attributes.notes: R 180 for robotic parking.

extractions.extraction_text: En viviendas unifamiliares agrupadas o adosadas, los elementos que formen parte de la estructura comun tendran la resistencia al fuego exigible a edificios de uso Residencial Vivienda.

attributes.norm_statement: In grouped or terraced single-family homes, common structural elements must have the fire resistance required for Residential Housing buildings.
attributes.notes: The specific R class depends on the evacuation height of the Residential Housing building, as per other norms in Table 3.1.

extractions.extraction_text: R 180 si la altura de evacuación del edificio excede de 28 m.

attributes.norm_statement: Fire resistance must be R 180 if the building's evacuation height exceeds 28 m.
attributes.notes: This note applies to Commercial, Public Assembly, Hospital uses, overriding the R120 for basements.

extractions.extraction_text: R 180 cuando se trate de aparecimientos robotizados.

attributes.norm_statement: Fire resistance must be R 180 for robotic parking facilities.
attributes.notes: This note applies to parking located under a different use, overriding the R120 for basements.

extractions.extraction_text: En el caso de sectores de riesgo minimo y en aquellos sectores de incendio en los que, por su tamaño y por la distribucion de la carga de fuego, no sea previsible la existencia de fuegos totalmente desarrollados, la comprobacion de la resistencia al fuego puede hacerse elemento a elemento mediante el estudio por medio de fuegos localizados, según se indica en el Eurocódigo 1 (UNE- EN 1991- 1- 2: 2004) situando sucesivamente la carga de fuego en la posición previsible más desfavorable.

attributes.Procedure: For minimum risk fire sectors and fire sectors where fully developed fires are not expected due to their size and fire load distribution, fire resistance verification can be performed element by element using localized fire studies, as indicated in Eurocode 1 (UNE-EN 1991-1-2: 2004), by successively placing the fire load in the most unfavorable foreseeable position.

attributes.summary: Standard for localized fire studies for fire resistance verification.

extractions.extraction_text:
peci al integradas en los edificios(1)

Riesgo especial medio
Riesgo especial alto
(1) No sera inferior al de la estructura portante de la planta del edificio excepto cuando la zona se encuentre bajo una cubierta no prevista para evacuacion y cuyo fallo no suponga riesgo para la estabilidad de otras plantas ni para la compar. timentacion contra incendios, en cuyo caso puede ser R 30. La resistencia al fuego suficiente R de los elementos estructurales de un suelo de una zona de riesgo especial es fun cion del uso del espacio existente bajo dicho suelo

attributes.norm_statement: The fire resistance of structural elements of a floor in a special risk area shall not be less than that of the load-bearing structure of the building's floor.
attributes.notes: If exempted, fire resistance can be R 30.

extractions.extraction_text: 2 La estructura principal de las cubiertas ligeras no previstas para ser utilizadas en la evacuacion de los ocupantes y cuya altura respecto de la rasante exterior no exceda de  $28m$  , asi como los elementos que unicamente sustenten dichas cubiertas, podran ser R 30 cuando su fallo no pueda ocasionar danos graves a los edificios o establecimientos proximos, ni comprometer la estabilidad de otras plantas inferiores o la compartmentacion de los sectores de incendio. A tales efectos, puede enten\\1\\1 como ligera aquella cubierta cuya carga permanente debida unicamente a su cerramiento no exceda de  $1 \mathrm{kN} / \mathrm{m}^2$ .

attributes.norm_statement: The main structure of light roofs not intended for occupant evacuation and whose height from the exterior ground level does not exceed 28m, as well as elements solely supporting these roofs, may have a fire resistance of R 30.
