                    (WALL.MATERIAL IN ['BRICK.CERAMIC', 'BRICK.SILICO_CALCAREOUS'] AND WALL.COATING == 'PLASTERED.EXPOSED_FACE' AND WALL.THICKNESS >= 240 AND FIRE_RESISTANCE == 'EI-240') OR
                    (WALL.MATERIAL IN ['BRICK.CERAMIC', 'BRICK.SILICO_CALCAREOUS'] AND WALL.COATING == 'PLASTERED.BOTH_FACES' AND WALL.THICKNESS >= 40 AND WALL.THICKNESS < 80 AND FIRE_RESISTANCE == 'EI-90') OR
                    (WALL.MATERIAL IN ['BRICK.CERAMIC', 'BRICK.SILICO_CALCAREOUS'] AND WALL.COATING == 'PLASTERED.BOTH_FACES' AND WALL.THICKNESS >= 80 AND WALL.THICKNESS < 110 AND FIRE_RESISTANCE == 'EI-180') OR
                    (WALL.MATERIAL IN ['BRICK.CERAMIC', 'BRICK.SILICO_CALCAREOUS'] AND WALL.COATING == 'PLASTERED.BOTH_FACES' AND WALL.THICKNESS >= 110 AND FIRE_RESISTANCE == 'EI-240') OR
                    (WALL.MATERIAL IN ['BRICK.CERAMIC', 'BRICK.SILICO_CALCAREOUS'] AND WALL.COATING == 'PLASTERED.BOTH_FACES' AND WALL.THICKNESS >= 110 AND WALL.THICKNESS < 200 AND FIRE_RESISTANCE == 'EI-240') OR
                    (WALL.MATERIAL IN ['BRICK.CERAMIC', 'BRICK.SILICO_CALCAREOUS'] AND WALL.COATING == 'PLASTERED.BOTH_FACES' AND WALL.THICKNESS >= 200 AND FIRE_RESISTANCE == 'REI-240') OR
                    (WALL.MATERIAL IN ['BRICK.CERAMIC', 'BRICK.SILICO_CALCAREOUS'] AND WALL.COATING == 'PLASTERED.BOTH_FACES' AND WALL.THICKNESS >= 140 AND WALL.THICKNESS < 240 AND FIRE_RESISTANCE == 'REI-240') OR
                    (WALL.MATERIAL IN ['BRICK.CERAMIC', 'BRICK.SILICO_CALCAREOUS'] AND WALL.COATING == 'PLASTERED.BOTH_FACES' AND WALL.THICKNESS >= 240 AND FIRE_RESISTANCE == 'REI-240')
attributes.notes: Fire resistance values are extracted directly from Table F.1. (1) indicates 'No es usual' (Not usual) which is interpreted as no specific classification provided for that range.

extractions.extraction_text: En el caso de soluciones constructivas formadas por dos o mas hojas puede adoptarse como valor de resistencia al fuego del conjunto la suma de los valores correspondientes a cada hoja.

attributes.procedure: For constructive solutions composed of two or more leaves, the fire resistance value of the assembly can be adopted as the sum of the values corresponding to each leaf.

attributes.norm_statement: Concrete block masonry walls and partitions must meet specified fire resistance ratings based on chamber type, aggregate type, coating type, and nominal thickness.
attributes.satisfied_if: (WALL.TYPE == 'SIMPLE' AND WALL.AGGREGATE_TYPE == 'NONE' AND WALL.COATING_TYPE == 'NONE' AND WALL.THICKNESS == 100 AND WALL.FIRE_RESISTANCE == 'EI-15'); OR (WALL.TYPE == 'SIMPLE' AND WALL.AGGREGATE_TYPE == 'SILICEOUS' AND WALL.COATING_TYPE == 'UNCOATED' AND WALL.THICKNESS == 150 AND WALL.FIRE_RESISTANCE == 'REI-60'); OR (WALL.TYPE == 'SIMPLE' AND WALL.AGGREGATE_TYPE == 'SILICEOUS' AND WALL.COATING_TYPE == 'UNCOATED' AND WALL.THICKNESS == 200 AND WALL.FIRE_RESISTANCE == 'REI-120'); OR (WALL.TYPE == 'SIMPLE' AND WALL.AGGREGATE_TYPE == 'CALCAREOUS' AND WALL.COATING_TYPE == 'UNCOATED' AND WALL.THICKNESS == 100 AND WALL.FIRE_RESISTANCE == 'EI-60'); OR (WALL.TYPE == 'SIMPLE' AND WALL.AGGREGATE_TYPE == 'CALCAREOUS' AND WALL.COATING_TYPE == 'UNCOATED' AND WALL.THICKNESS == 150 AND WALL.FIRE_RESISTANCE == 'REI-90'); OR (WALL.TYPE == 'SIMPLE' AND WALL.AGGREGATE_TYPE == 'CALCAREOUS' AND WALL.COATING_TYPE == 'UNCOATED' AND WALL.THICKNESS == 200 AND WALL.FIRE_RESISTANCE == 'REI-180'); OR (WALL.TYPE == 'SIMPLE' AND WALL.AGGREGATE_TYPE == 'VOLCANIC' AND WALL.COATING_TYPE == 'UNCOATED' AND WALL.THICKNESS == 120 AND WALL.FIRE_RESISTANCE == 'EI-120'); OR (WALL.TYPE == 'SIMPLE' AND WALL.AGGREGATE_TYPE == 'VOLCANIC' AND WALL.COATING_TYPE == 'UNCOATED' AND WALL.THICKNESS == 200 AND WALL.FIRE_RESISTANCE == 'REI-180'); OR (WALL.TYPE == 'SIMPLE' AND WALL.AGGREGATE_TYPE == 'VOLCANIC' AND WALL.COATING_TYPE == 'PLASTERED_BOTH_SIDES' AND WALL.THICKNESS == 90 AND WALL.FIRE_RESISTANCE == 'EI-180'); OR (WALL.TYPE == 'SIMPLE' AND WALL.AGGREGATE_TYPE == 'VOLCANIC' AND WALL.COATING_TYPE == 'PLASTERED_EXPOSED_SIDE' AND WALL.THICKNESS == 120 AND WALL.FIRE_RESISTANCE == 'EI-180'); OR (WALL.TYPE == 'SIMPLE' AND WALL.AGGREGATE_TYPE == 'VOLCANIC' AND WALL.COATING_TYPE == 'PLASTERED_EXPOSED_SIDE' AND WALL.THICKNESS == 200 AND WALL.FIRE_RESISTANCE == 'REI-240'); OR (WALL.TYPE == 'DOUBLE' AND WALL.AGGREGATE_TYPE == 'EXPANDED_CLAY' AND WALL.COATING_TYPE == 'UNCOATED' AND WALL.THICKNESS == 150 AND WALL.FIRE_RESISTANCE == 'EI-180'); OR (WALL.TYPE == 'DOUBLE' AND WALL.AGGREGATE_TYPE == 'EXPANDED_CLAY' AND WALL.COATING_TYPE == 'PLASTERED_BOTH_SIDES' AND WALL.THICKNESS == 150 AND (WALL.FIRE_RESISTANCE == 'RE-240' OR WALL.FIRE_RESISTANCE == 'REI-80'))
